TCP_ConnectionBuffer_t Struct Reference

#include <TCP.h>

Data Fields

uint16_t Length
uint8_t Data [TCP_WINDOW_SIZE]

Detailed Description

Type define for a TCP connection buffer structure, including size, data and direction

Field Documentation

uint8_t TCP_ConnectionBuffer_t::Data[TCP_WINDOW_SIZE]

TCP application data buffer

bool TCP_ConnectionBuffer_t::Direction

Buffer transmission direction, either TCP_PACKETDIR_IN or TCP_PACKETDIR_OUT

bool TCP_ConnectionBuffer_t::InUse
uint16_t TCP_ConnectionBuffer_t::Length

Length of data in the TCP application buffer

bool TCP_ConnectionBuffer_t::Ready

If data from host, indicates buffer ready to be read, otherwise indicates buffer ready to be sent to the host
